author: Vivienne Clarke, Paul Cullen
title: Coronavirus: Gardaí can instruct holiday home occupants to go home under new powers
description: Restrictions set to be extended as citizens warned against ‘social sabotage’ at Easter
content:
Minister for Justice Charlie Flanagan has said gardaí will be able to knock on the doors of holiday homes and instruct to people to go home under the new regualtions. 
The new regulations are in place until Easter Sunday, he told RTÉ radios Today with Séan O… [+4737 chars]
